name: [LD47] Falling Asleep
description:
ENTRY: COMPO

STORY:
You are a sleep agent... your job is to rescue those who are stuck in a nightmare.
Today, you're tasked with rescuing Bobby from a nightmare where he's stuck in an infinite falling loop.
Find a way to fix the dream and wake Bobby up!

CONTROLS:
- Left Click: Grab item 1
- Right Click: Gran item 2
- Space: Combine item 1 & 2 into a new item

IMPROVEMENTS:
- More missions

BUGS:
- Loading screen jittery

TOOLS & ASSETS USED:
- Engine: Unity 3D
- Photoshop: Sprites
- Music/Effects: Audacity
- Music: AIVA
